column1: w. wayne smithee| w. wayne smithee january 26
column8: 2015 at elkhart general hospital. he was born on january 26
column10: arkansas to the late luther and hazel (mathis) smithee. he is survived by three sisters
column11: peggy pettit of middlebury; brenda patterson of columbia
column13: and karen smithee of elkhart and several nieces and nephews. no formal services are planned at this time
column14: cremation will take place. to sign the online guest register book go to elkartcremation. com arrangements entrusted to elkhart cremation services.
